profile_positions.description:
Reporting into CFO Lixil Water Technology.

Visited and stayed in South Africa; 3 weeks there and 1 week not and so on for the complete period. 

Responsibilities
•	Execute an audit with a focus on working capital.
•	Analyse the Order to Cash Process.
•	Improve the outstanding Accounts Receivable Balance and reduce the Overdue.
•	Set up standard reporting around Accounts Payable and Accounts Receivable.
•	Improve the cash flow forecast process and procedure.

Key Results
•	Order to Cash processes has been restructured (Accounts Payable and Accounts Receivable).
•	Standard processes in 4 different entities are implemented and documented for SOX compliancy.
•	Reports are designed and developed in Qlik View to manage the performance.
•	A 3 months rolling cash flow forecast is developed bottom up and top down in excel.
